comments: I'm addicted to this game especially the daily challenge boards. Pros: pencil feature, all instances of the number Are highlighted when you fill in a cell. Con: the timer starts when board opens, would like it to start after filling in 1st cell. As others have said the ads are right below the numbers, too easy to tap when your on a roll.

Just downloaded this app.  So far a very well executed app with excellent layout and controls/easy and fluid to use.  Much better than other Sodoku b/c no ads during actual game play!  The only "con" is that I cant put graphics behind gameboard. Only suggestion: Would like to see options for backgrounds like in Solitaire. This would truely make it a 5 star game!   Ps. I was not paid/reimbursed or otherwise incentivised for this review in any way.

I like this app, but it feels like it could be more educational. I get stuck on the expert puzzles and often have to use the hints, the way the hints just tell you the number in a selected square doesn't help me work out what I'm missing. If the hint could show me how I could reveal another number would be more helpful to me. Otherwise top notch app

It's a pretty decent sudoku implementation, far better than a lot of the other ones out there I should say. The only issues I have are firstly I do find the "penciled" numbers to be a little on the small side (on a 5.5" screen). I'd also say that for those of us that don't find the "expert" setting particularly difficult (without meaning to sound arrogant), it would be good to have a step above that. And finally a Google Play leaderboard would be a nice addition. None of these are massive problems, it's a good app as I said.

Great app. I can do Sudoku on the app with the 'write' facility for numerical notes and I like how it removes them automatically as you fill in other areas. But I still find it very difficult to do paper Sudokus because I can't fill in the right answers without loads of workings out on the more challenging puzzles. The app makes this aspect easy.

I would greatly prefer to start by touching a number rather than touching a cell.  I have to hunt for a cell with the number I am working with, touch that to show where all instances of that number are, then touch each cell and the number to place either the number or a note that this might be the number.  If I could select the number first, I would only have to touch each cell to place that number, then turn on "note mode" and touch each cell for a note.  Only half the taps per game, saving both time and the muscles in my arthritic hands!
description: Sudoku for beginners and advanced players. Whether you'd like to relax or keep mind active – pass your free time in a pleasant way! Get a small stimulating break or clear your head with sudoku. Take your favorite app with you wherever you go. Playing Sudoku on mobile is as good as with a real pencil and paper.Choose any level you like. Play easier levels to exercise your brain, logical thinking and memory, or try hard levels to give your mind a real workout. Our classic puzzle game has some features that make sudoku easier for you: hints, auto-check, and duplicates highlight. You can use them or complete the challenge without help – it's up to you! What's more, in our app each puzzle has one solution. You will find all you need whether you are playing your first sudoku, or you've progressed to expert difficulty.Features✓ Complete Daily Challenges and get unique trophies✓ Challenge yourself figuring out your mistakes, or enable Auto-Check to see your mistakes as you go✓ Turn on Pencil mode to make notes as on paper. Each time you fill in a cell, notes are automatically updated!✓ Highlight duplicates to avoid repeating numbers in a row, column and block✓ Hints can guide you through the points when you are stuckMore features- Statistics. Track your progress for each difficulty level: analyze your best time and other achievements- Unlimited Undos. Made a mistake? Just put it back quickly!- Auto-save. If you leave a sudoku unfinished it will be saved. Continue playing anytime- Highlighting of a row, column and box related to the selected cell- Eraser. Get rid of all mistakesHighlights• More than 5,000 well-formed puzzles• 9x9 grid• 4 perfectly balanced levels of difficulty: easy, medium, hard, and expert• Support both phones and tablets• Portrait and landscape mode for tablets• Simple and intuitive designTrain your brain anywhere, anytime!
descriptionHTML:
Sudoku for beginners and advanced players. Whether you'd like to relax or keep mind active – pass your free time in a pleasant way! Get a small stimulating break or clear your head with sudoku. Take your favorite app with you wherever you go. Playing Sudoku on mobile is as good as with a real pencil and paper.

Choose any level you like. Play easier levels to exercise your brain, logical thinking and memory, or try hard levels to give your mind a real workout. Our classic puzzle game has some features that make sudoku easier for you: hints, auto-check, and duplicates highlight. You can use them or complete the challenge without help – it's up to you! What's more, in our app each puzzle has one solution. You will find all you need whether you are playing your first sudoku, or you've progressed to expert difficulty.

Features
✓ Complete Daily Challenges and get unique trophies
✓ Challenge yourself figuring out your mistakes, or enable Auto-Check to see your mistakes as you go
✓ Turn on Pencil mode to make notes as on paper. Each time you fill in a cell, notes are automatically updated!
✓ Highlight duplicates to avoid repeating numbers in a row, column and block
✓ Hints can guide you through the points when you are stuck

More features
- Statistics. Track your progress for each difficulty level: analyze your best time and other achievements
- Unlimited Undos. Made a mistake? Just put it back quickly!
- Auto-save. If you leave a sudoku unfinished it will be saved. Continue playing anytime
- Highlighting of a row, column and box related to the selected cell
- Eraser. Get rid of all mistakes

Highlights
• More than 5,000 well-formed puzzles
• 9x9 grid
• 4 perfectly balanced levels of difficulty: easy, medium, hard, and expert
• Support both phones and tablets
• Portrait and landscape mode for tablets
• Simple and intuitive design

Train your brain anywhere, anytime!

3 Krinou street

summary: Play classic Sudoku and train your brain for FREE!
title: Sudoku

comments: This game is actually really fun, but two stars for the ads. They're not well-distributed, having reached a point where no ads would show up after a few runs, and then one would appear after every run no matter how short. A 30 second ad after a run that ended in just a couple seconds? Multiple times in a row? I understand ads needs to be there, but I'd like to have more play time than ad time.

Very enjoyable game, quite addictive and jumping back into a new game is quick. Couple of gripes, there seems to be some slow down or framrate dipping after an ad has shown and the option to remove ads isn't working. Sort this out and it will get another 2 stars

The game itself is pretty fun. I think I'd like it. But the ads are far, far too intrusive. Not only are there too many. But, many of them have timers. Some are 30 seconds, and you can't break out. Too annoying. I have no interest I sitting and waiting for ads to finish

Wow!!!! I've never been more annoyed with an app in my life!!! I would play this game all day long but the amount of ads are literally driving me insane! Two runs and another 15 second ad comes up. No thanks
Ads pop up during gameplay where your fingers contact so it stops game play ... other than that it's good but I've had enough. Fk you chilly:-p uninstalling

This game was my favorite of any maybe ever. I played all the time, then there was an update and I had to uninstall. It made the app close constantly (even when it wasn't even open and I was in other apps), there's way too many ads that make me want to vomit, and it stats to lag now when it never did before. Someone at corporate ruined this game. Smh.

comments: I love this game. The design is minimalist but the fun is maximalist! I suggest this game to anyone who is tired of games getting easier and easier every year. Keep up the good work!    I think the controls are pretty easy and comfortable. And, yes I'm right handed. I don't understand why people complain about the archer being on the left. It's not like you need to do a complex motion to control the bow and arrow, it's pretty simple; pull and let go. I feel more comfortable controlling the shield with my right hand as you need to time it perfectly.
Great game, but I've run into situations where I click to watch the ad to double coins and it just sits there on the death screen.  Other than that, good job.
I really want to play this game it looks great! However the menu doesn't work (won't respond) on my Google pixel and I have tried reloading to no avail, please fix this :)
Enjoyable, but the not playing ads for extra coins because of a lack of connection and then playing an additional ad right way. Frustrating!
Really enjoyed this game not worth 1 unskipable advert for half a minute every level abit disappointing

description: Little Baby Injection Simulator is a surgery doctor game in which little baby is feeling sick that is why kids patients are coming to er emergency hospital with their parents for injection treatment after getting diagnosis of kids disease infection from blood test doctor in er emergency hospital simulator. The er emergency hospital simulator is crowded with kids patient that have various blood related diseases & you are the only surgery doctor in this hospital simulation game who is going to treat the little baby. Collect blood sample of little baby, test blood sample and analyze it with a microscope. With proper care and medicine, little baby can recover quickly. Insert cannula on little baby hand to inject medicine into little baby body quickly. A needle prick of injection may cause slight bleeding from kids patient skin. Clean away the blood with a cotton swab. Apply injection simulator to little baby arm or butts and collect blood sample in test tube to test Polio, Hepatitis, pneumonia, Chicken Pox and Measles & other Infection disease. Little Baby Injection Simulator is all about how to inject medicine on butts with injection, drawing blood sample from arm with syringe to test different blood infections & how to apply vaccination injection on little baby as it is always recommended for little baby to get vaccinated to prevent different blood infection or diseases from surgery doctor.Practice your injection skills on sick kids patient in this Little Baby Injection Simulator : Kids test Doctor. There might be inexperienced nurses & er emergency surgery doctor who cause pain while injecting medicine with injection simulator. Get to the surgery simulator hospital now and attend your sick kids patient coming in er emergency ambulance simulator. The poor kids have painful expressions and a fear in baby pretty little eyes. Treat kids with all the doctor instruments and injection simulator at er emergency surgery hospital simulator. At first surgery doctor will rub some numbing cotton over the area of body of kids on where the injection simulator syringe needs to be put to get blood sample. From there surgery doctor will take the blood test and other injection simulator tasks, be careful when you prick a needle. Apply an antiseptic cream with a cotton swab to avoid any bleeding from kids patient skin.Features:* Amazing injection simulator surgery games.* Draw blood from patients vein with injection.* Send the blood sample to the hospital laboratory.* Collect blood sample and test it with a microscope.* Practice er emergency surgery steps to perform surgery simulator.* Treat serious injuries on patients in ER emergency hospital surgery room.* Use ER emergency doctor tools & injection to save lives in er emergency hospital.

This pixel coloring book as an pixel art therapy helps you relieve stress and anxiety from reality. comments: This game stinks. Only way I can see to login is to be on Facebook. Which I refuse to do. Facebook sucks and so does this game. Uninstalling. Goodbye.

I actually really like this game, graphics are beautiful and the concept is fun... problem is, I've had it a week and been in the game 4x. It doesn't load... like ever. I've restarted my phone, uninstalled and installed and nothing. It just sits on the opening screen, sadly I will have to delete. Wish I didn't have to but it's just wasting space on my phone now. Otherwise, I did enjoy it.

Its completely pay to play. You have to use diamonds to expand your land, but you can't earn them. You have to buy them with real money. It would be a problem if you could buy a small amount for like $0.99... But the minimum is $10 Its ridiculous.

I would love the game,if there was really something to do, no interaction,from what I've read this is a useless app.i got on after the update today,and my screen is blank except for my buildings,the scenery is gone,black! I am on a mobile and can't use any of the great functions everyone talks about. I can't even help my team,totally disappointed,that's for sure. And I've spent quite a bit of money. I am so bored.Theres only a couple things to enjoy on it.Come on ,why can't you get this game together for Android users?

Playing on the phone app. I am disappointed that I cannot play the full version. I cannot send messages to my fellowship members, I cannot see their cities, I cannot participate in the events with my teammates. All I am doing all day every day is trying to build up resources for upgrades, and those are high compared with how much you can make. You cannot earm free diamonds, and many of the buildings you cannot get without them. Will rate higher when these things are improved.

The game is beautiful, but its a bit to complicated. And the in app purchases are rediculus. I'd love it if you could actually advance in the games. There are just too many things needed to advance in the slightest. It's too bad cuz the game it has great graphics.
description: BUILD THE CITY OF YOUR DREAMS IN MAGICAL ELVENARChoose between elves and humans to build a beautiful, fantasy city. Discover a world of magic and mystery as you constantly build, develop and expand your realm. You decide how to advance your city as you gather resources, trade with other players and research ancient technologies. Whether you want to build a whimsical paradise or a well-organized metropolis, it’s easy to create a home for fantasy creatures and enjoy the detailed beauty of Elvenar.CHOOSE YOUR RACEPlay as powerful humans or magical elves to build as you see fitSTART INSTANTLYCity building is quick and easy with a friendly introduction and active communityEXPLORE THE WORLDDiscover new provinces to expand your cityTRADE WITH FRIENDSTrade goods and resources with fellow players and merchants in the marketplaceADVANCE YOUR CIVILIZATIONUpgrade your buildings to supply your growing populationWELCOME NEW CREATURESCreate a home for dwarves, fairies, dragons and other charming fantasy racesElvenar is based on the successful browser city-builder, published by InnoGames. Now players can enjoy the online fantasy fun on mobile, tablet and PC browser – all from the same account. Elvenar is free to download and install. However, some game features can also be purchased for real money. If you don’t want to use this feature, you can disable in-app purchases in your device’s settings. A network connection is also required.Imprint: https://legal.innogames.com/portal/en/imprint
descriptionHTML:
BUILD THE CITY OF YOUR DREAMS IN MAGICAL ELVENAR

Choose between elves and humans to build a beautiful, fantasy city. Discover a world of magic and mystery as you constantly build, develop and expand your realm. You decide how to advance your city as you gather resources, trade with other players and research ancient technologies. Whether you want to build a whimsical paradise or a well-organized metropolis, it’s easy to create a home for fantasy creatures and enjoy the detailed beauty of Elvenar.

CHOOSE YOUR RACE
Play as powerful humans or magical elves to build as you see fit

START INSTANTLY
City building is quick and easy with a friendly introduction and active community

EXPLORE THE WORLD
Discover new provinces to expand your city

TRADE WITH FRIENDS
Trade goods and resources with fellow players and merchants in the marketplace

ADVANCE YOUR CIVILIZATION
Upgrade your buildings to supply your growing population

WELCOME NEW CREATURES
Create a home for dwarves, fairies, dragons and other charming fantasy races

Elvenar is based on the successful browser city-builder, published by InnoGames. Now players can enjoy the online fantasy fun on mobile, tablet and PC browser – all from the same account.

Elvenar is free to download and install. However, some game features can also be purchased for real money. If you don’t want to use this feature, you can disable in-app purchases in your device’s settings. A network connection is also required.

Imprint: https://legal.innogames.com/portal/en/imprint
recentChanges: Our Easter Event The Phoenix Cult is available! Log in now and get some great new and unique buildings for your city!
With this Event, a new type of building is introduced: the Wishing Well. This building will regularly grant you a random resource, including Diamonds!
You can now use the Enchantments you produced in the Magic Academy!
summary: Create a flourishing fantasy city and discover a magical world full of mysteries
title: Elvenar

description: Play a soccer match at the beach under the sun. Shoot balls to the goal avoiding the goalkeeper or the obstacles. Multiply your score passing the ball through the rings or hitting the poles. In the very first levels the goalkeeper is a noob but as you pass levels it will get harder to score goals. Be ready to challenge yourself against other player in the tournament and you will get a cup fragment. When you complete the cup you will start the second road to another soccer cup.Play in career mode, in which you will have to win the beach soccer championship, with over 150 levels that will force you to show that you are the best soccer player, and the best in free kicks and penalties. In this soccer game, you also have a new soccer mode of challenges, in which you must complete some soccer challenges and get the victory to get a great reward, show that you are capable of achieving them and become the best soccer player of history!In this soccer game:★ ★ ★ ★ ★ Show your skills shooting goals from the penalty point.★ ★ ★ ★ ★ Avoid the players wall to score like the best football players in the world.★ ★ ★ ★ ★ Compete in the beach soccer league and get all the cup fragments.★ ★ ★ ★ ★ Take down all the boxes in a funny game mode.★ ★ ★ ★ ★ Enhance your player skills like ball effect, power or accuracy.Shoot Goal Beach Soccer 2018 is the best beach soccer game! This game is completely free but you can make some purchases to level up your player skills or game assets. 2018 Bambo Studio
descriptionHTML:
Play a soccer match at the beach under the sun. Shoot balls to the goal avoiding the goalkeeper or the obstacles. Multiply your score passing the ball through the rings or hitting the poles. In the very first levels the goalkeeper is a noob but as you pass levels it will get harder to score goals. Be ready to challenge yourself against other player in the tournament and you will get a cup fragment. When you complete the cup you will start the second road to another soccer cup.

Play in career mode, in which you will have to win the beach soccer championship, with over 150 levels that will force you to show that you are the best soccer player, and the best in free kicks and penalties. In this soccer game, you also have a new soccer mode of challenges, in which you must complete some soccer challenges and get the victory to get a great reward, show that you are capable of achieving them and become the best soccer player of history!

★ ★ ★ ★ ★ Show your skills shooting goals from the penalty point.

Shoot Goal Beach Soccer 2018 is the best beach soccer game! This game is completely free but you can make some purchases to level up your player skills or game assets.

2018 Bambo Studio

description: Welcome to the Ski Resort Village. Start your Vacation Today! Drive and park a huge roster of winter vehicles around the charming snow-covered ski village.Features:▶ DISCOVER A PICTURESQUE TOURIST DESTINATION - mountain roads, hotels, ice skate rinks, ski slopes and slaloms!▶ 15 COOL CARS - snow plows, road gritter truck, buses, 4x4 pickup trucks, a snowmobile bike and more!▶ 75 MISSIONS TO COMPLETE - prove your skills in precision driving and parking▶ CUSTOMIZABLE CONTROL METHODS - choose one that suits your style!▶ 100% FREE TO PLAY - all the way through, no strings attached!Ski Resort Parking Simulator is a unique driving game, that will help you feel the charm of the winter season. Drive cars and other varied vehicles in the snow, beholding the magnificent view. Complete missions that require you to drive and park not only with precision and skill but also on a clock.Speed is important, though remember - it's not a race! Make sure to be careful and thorough. Safety is also important. The better your time, the higher your chances for greater rewards that in turn unlock new cars to drive and park. But crash and all will be lost. Park cars, trucks, snow plows, gritters, cars & caravans, buses and even a super-quick snowmobile! Drive fast, but also drive safe and your score will reflect that.Explore the ski resort area but beware of the treacherous and slippery snow and ice covered roads! Can you survive the conditions to pass all 75 parking missions in one piece? It won't be easy, but the rewards you'll earn will be worth it. Learn to drive all of the cars, get to know their weak and strong sides. Give it some time and you will master the art of driving in all available vehicles!
descriptionHTML:
Welcome to the Ski Resort Village. Start your Vacation Today! Drive and park a huge roster of winter vehicles around the charming snow-covered ski village.

Features:
▶ DISCOVER A PICTURESQUE TOURIST DESTINATION - mountain roads, hotels, ice skate rinks, ski slopes and slaloms!
▶ 15 COOL CARS - snow plows, road gritter truck, buses, 4x4 pickup trucks, a snowmobile bike and more!
▶ 75 MISSIONS TO COMPLETE - prove your skills in precision driving and parking
▶ CUSTOMIZABLE CONTROL METHODS - choose one that suits your style!
▶ 100% FREE TO PLAY - all the way through, no strings attached!

Ski Resort Parking Simulator is a unique driving game, that will help you feel the charm of the winter season. Drive cars and other varied vehicles in the snow, beholding the magnificent view. Complete missions that require you to drive and park not only with precision and skill but also on a clock.

Speed is important, though remember - it's not a race! Make sure to be careful and thorough. Safety is also important. The better your time, the higher your chances for greater rewards that in turn unlock new cars to drive and park. But crash and all will be lost. Park cars, trucks, snow plows, gritters, cars & caravans, buses and even a super-quick snowmobile! Drive fast, but also drive safe and your score will reflect that.

Explore the ski resort area but beware of the treacherous and slippery snow and ice covered roads! Can you survive the conditions to pass all 75 parking missions in one piece? It won't be easy, but the rewards you'll earn will be worth it. Learn to drive all of the cars, get to know their weak and strong sides. Give it some time and you will master the art of driving in all available vehicles!
